thread.title: 19 Things You'll Know If You're 50% Picky Eater And 50% Adventurous Eater
thread.title_full: 19 Things You'll Know If You're 50% Picky Eater And 50% Adventurous Eater

author: Jasmin Nahar
title: 19 Things You'll Know If You're 50% Picky Eater And 50% Adventurous Eater
text:
View this image ›
Studio Ghibli ID: 10618058 2. In fact, some of your favourite foods are ones you tried outside of your comfort zone. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com ID: 10618061 3. But you’re always torn between taking a gamble or sticking with a tried and tested favourite. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10618278 4. You’ll only like some foods when they’re made in a specific way. View this image ›
Getty Images / Jasmin Nahar / BuzzFeed ID: 10618062 5. Or by a certain person. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com ID: 10618070 6. Which means your loved ones get confused as to what it is you do and don’t eat. View this image ›
Paramount To be honest, you’re not 100% sure yourself sometimes.
ID: 10618321 7. You’re an expert at picking out stuff you don’t like from your food. View this image ›
Twitter: @suzannaswims ID: 10618057 8. But you could never be a truly picky eater, as eating the same foods on rotation gets boring for you. View this image ›
Gena-mour Barrett / BuzzFeed ID: 10618060 9. You don’t tend to be fussy about which restaurants you go to, and you have lots of favourites. View this image ›
Twitter: @HungryHoss ID: 10618088 10. But you always like to thoroughly research the place online to decide what you’ll eat beforehand. View this image ›
Rosa’s Thai / Jasmin Nahar / BuzzFeed ID: 10618090 11. And even if there’s lots of menu options that appeal to you, you probably have to make a lot of requests when ordering it. View this image ›
Twitter: @brvndonchannn ID: 10618071 12. So going to someone’s house, where you have less control over the whole food situation, is pretty stressful. View this image ›
Jamie Jones / BuzzFeed ID: 10618089 13. When faced with food you can’t stand but have to be polite, you do your best to salvage it and eat around the worst bits. View this image ›
Twitter: @_YUNG_TACO ID: 10618353 14. Finding a ready made sandwich you like is basically impossible. View this image ›
Tesco / Jasmin Nahar / BuzzFeed ID: 10618121 15. And you find it downright upsetting when you get food but the sauce is on it rather than to the side. View this image ›
Getty Images / Jasmin Nahar / BuzzFeed ID: 10618085 16. So overall you tend to prefer making things at home where you’re more in control of the ingredients. View this image ›
Flickr: rossination ID: 10618122 17. People sometimes assume that you must like bland food, but you like your meals flavourful. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com ID: 10618124 18. It’s just that certain foods and textures bother you, and no matter how much you try them you won’t change your mind. View this image ›
Columbia Pictures ID: 10618359 19. So while you can be picky, you like enough ~adventurous~ foods to know you’re not super fussy. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10618077
Jasmin Nahar is a junior staff writer at BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
